Process the (year specific) Alarms Telecare extract

Source: R/process_extract_alarms_telecare.R
process_extract_alarms_telecare.Rd

This will read and process the (year specific) Alarms Telecare extract, it will return the final data but also write this out as rds.

Usage

process_extract_alarms_telecare(
  data = NULL,
  year,
  client_lookup = NULL,
  write_to_disk = TRUE
)

Arguments

data

The extract to process. (Optional) Can be passed through a data list or alternatively read the file from disk.

year

The year to process, in FY format.

client_lookup

The client lookup extract (Optional) Can be passed through a data list or alternatively read the file from disk.

write_to_disk

(optional) Should the data be written to disk default is TRUE i.e. write the data to disk.

Value

the final data as a tibble.

See also

Other process extracts: process_extract_acute(), process_extract_ae(), process_extract_cmh(), process_extract_delayed_discharges(), process_extract_district_nursing(), process_extract_home_care(), process_extract_homelessness(), process_extract_maternity(), process_extract_mental_health(), process_extract_nrs_deaths(), process_extract_outpatients(), process_extract_prescribing(), process_extract_sds(), process_lookup_chi_deaths(), process_lookup_gpprac(), process_lookup_postcode(), process_lookup_sc_client(), process_lookup_sc_demographics(), process_sc_all_alarms_telecare(), process_sc_all_home_care(), process_sc_all_sds(), read_lookup_chi_deaths(), read_lookup_sc_client()
